Columns.Description: Time at which this event is generated and logged
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The final state of this data ingestion operation
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: The name of the database holding the target table
Columns.Name: Database

Columns.Description: The name of the target table into which the data is ingested
Columns.Name: Table

Columns.Description: Indicates whether or not the failure originate from an Update Policy
Columns.Name: OriginatesFromUpdatePolicy

Columns.Description: Indicates whether or not the failure is transient and should be retried
Columns.Name: ShouldRetry

Columns.Description: Time at which this ingest operation failed
Columns.Name: FailedOn

Columns.Description: A unique identifier representing the ingested source
Columns.Name: IngestionSourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
